summary: METAL BAR INSIDE VEHICLE HEAD RESTS SEPARATES FROM THE FOAM.  DOWNWARD PRESSURE ON THE HEAD RESTS WILL CAUSE THE METAL BAR TO PUSH THROUGH THE HEAD REST FOAM.  THE RESULT IS A HARD METAL BAR PROTRUDING FROM THE HEAD REST.  IN AN ACCIDENT THE PASSENGER'S / DRIVER'S  HEADS WILL HIT A RIGID STEEL BAR, RATHER THAN A PADDED SUPPORT.   *NLM
